people_also_ask.question: Was there a Final Fantasy 6?
people_also_ask.heading: Final Fantasy VI is the sixth main entry in the Final Fantasy series and the first to be directed by someone other than series creator Hironobu Sakaguchi; the role was instead filled by Yoshinori Kitase and Hiroyuki Ito. ... In 2017, Nintendo re-released Final Fantasy VI as part of the company's Super NES Classic Edition.

people_also_ask.question: Will there be a Final Fantasy VI remake?
people_also_ask.heading: The best Final Fantasy game is getting a remaster (no, not that one again) The Final Fantasy series is going back to its roots once more. people_also_ask.question: Is Final Fantasy 3 the same as 6?
people_also_ask.heading: In Japan, Final Fantasy III is actually the excellent Final Fantasy VI, making the SNES Classic a great way to replay the iconic role-playing title, or try it out for the first time. ... And so FFVI became FFIII, until later localizations and rereleases saw the name changed back to its original.26-Jun-2017
